org.trianacode.taskgraph

Interface ParameterNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Node
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ErrorNode, ParameterNodeImp, RunnableParameterNode, TriggerNode

    public interface ParameterNode
extends Node
    The interface implemented by all parameter nodes
